revised_title: Microscopical Observations on Farina Faecundans of Hollyhock and Passion-Flower
tldr: The author, R. Badcock, conducted microscopical observations on the farina faecundans of the hollyhock and passion-flower. He discovered differences in the course of farina in each flower and their reactions to various liquids. The study provides insights into plant reproduction and the role of farina in the process.
